idea-plugin.name: QuickSloth
idea-plugin.description:
Code recommendations - QuickSloth.
Our code recommendatios is based in a modular evaluator system How to use it:
  1. Use the shortcut to make appear a dialog (Ctrl+Alt+K or Cmd+Alt+K) or open the toolwindow
  2. Type the search inside the text field and use enter or click in search
  3. After sucessfull search, select desired code lines and decide between insert in code or copy to clipboard
Observation: We use your current file to get some data and help in order to a better recommendation. For more details see plugin page on GitHub.
